segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes by the sink, completely unaware of the water overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn't seem to notice or care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing like that, it's creating such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside through the window, it looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on that plate, it's like she's in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the water soon before it causes any damage to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he's about to fall any second now, it's making me really nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet, it's like she's completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR
